channel.title: Tops on Curious Joe
channel.description: Recent content in Tops on Curious Joe

item.description: I’m a data scientist by profession. I work in the higher education industry. I come from a business management background with trainings in computer programming. I have worked in the market research and telecommunication industries before moving into data science. I love the always changing and improving nature of the technology industry especially in the area of data science and artificial intelligence. I have a bachelor degree in Business Administration and MS in Quality Management and Assurance.
